lead_paragraph: Wings Cory Jane and Julian Savea scored two tries each as the Hurricanes produced a first-half blitz to crush South Africa's Lions 50-17 in their Super Rugby clash at Ellis Park on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Hurricanes' Jane and Savea Feast on Meek Lions
headline.main: Hurricanes' Jane and Savea Feast on Meek Lions

snippet: Wings Cory Jane and Julian Savea scored two tries each as the Hurricanes produced a first-half blitz to crush South Africa's Lions 50-17 in their Super Rugby clash at Ellis Park on Saturday....
